Screens.PlayerInstructions: Did the winning plan include this agenda item?

Text.your_item: This is your agenda item! Convince the Decider to choose it and win bonus points!

Screens.DeciderInstructionsOutLoud: Everyone, please introduce your character roles. You will be playing from this perspective this round.

Screens.DeciderInstructions: Time's up! I will now choose the best proposal.
Screens.PlayerInstructions: The Decider is selecting the winner for the best proposal!

Screens.ClientInstructions: Important stuff happening! Please wait while the Host picks a topic for your game...
Screens.HostInstructions: Please pick a topic for your game:

Screens.DeciderInstructions: Press 'deliberate' to start the next round. Be sure to ask probing questions about the proposal and encourage questions among players.

Screens.DeciderInstructionsOutLoud: This is the deliberation round! Let's talk more about your proposals. This round is three minutes long, and more free-form. Once the round is done, players could buy more time to deliberate.
Screens.DeciderInstructions: Press next when everyone is ready

Screens.Instructions: Your device has disconnected from the game. This might be because the host left the game or because your device is having trouble connecting to the WIFI.

Screens.ClientInstructions: Choose a game to join. There may be multiple games in your area, so be sure to join the right one!
